briefdescription.para: Constructor for the NonLinearElastic class.

parameterdescription.para: The type for the volume load function.
The type for the Neumann boundary load function.
The global basis for the finite element.
The element for which the finite element is constructed.
The material for the non-linear elastic element.
Volume load function (default is LoadDefault).
Neumann boundary patch (default is nullptr).
Neumann boundary load function (default is LoadDefault).

memberdef.name: displacementFunction

briefdescription.para: Get the displacement function for the given FERequirementType.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar type for the displacement function.
The FERequirementType object.
Optional displacement vector.

simplesect.para: A StandardLocalFunction representing the displacement function.

briefdescription.para: The strain function for the given FERequirementType.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar type for the strain function.
The FERequirementType object.
Optional displacement vector.

simplesect.para: The strain function calculated using greenLagrangeStrains.

memberdef.definition: auto Ikarus::NonLinearElastic< Basis_, Material_, FERequirements_, useEigenRef >::getMaterialTangent
memberdef.name: getMaterialTangent

briefdescription.para: Get the material tangent for the given strain.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar type for the material and strain.
The dimension of the strain vector.
Flag indicating whether to use Voigt notation.
The strain vector.

simplesect.para: The material tangent calculated using the material's tangentModuli function.

briefdescription.para: Get the internal energy for the given strain.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar type for the material and strain.
The dimension of the strain vector.
The strain vector.

simplesect.para: The internal energy calculated using the material's storedEnergy function.

briefdescription.para: Get the stress for the given strain.

parameterdescription.para: The scalar type for the material and strain.
The dimension of the strain vector.
A boolean indicating whether to use the Voigt notation for stress.
The strain vector.

simplesect.para: The stress vector calculated using the material's stresses function.

briefdescription.para: NonLinearElastic class represents a non-linear elastic finite element.

parameterdescription.para: The basis type for the finite element.
The material type for the finite element.
The requirements for the finite element.
A boolean flag indicating whether to use Eigen references.
